## Description {#details}

A SystemZ-specific class detailing special use registers particular for calling conventions.

It is abstract, all calling conventions must override and define the pure virtual member function defined in this class.

Definition at line 47 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/systemz/systemzregisterinfo-h">SystemZRegisterInfo.h</a>.
